meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Barbara Platz Keith Walker Judy Goodnight Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #584.

td.p: Barbara Platz, a microbiologist from Hendersonville, North Carolina
Keith Walker, an attorney from Pomona, California
Judy Goodnight, a pre-kindergarten teacher from Memphis, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,800)

tr.td: SCIENCE
NEWSCASTERS
FOREIGN U.S. CITIES
CRACKER JACK
HISTORY
"SOFT"
